desc: At KetoPet, our mission is to help dogs everywhere live longer, happier lives by teaching pet parents how to feed a raw ketogenic diet.

layout.text: Our Mission: The Ketogenic Diet For Dogs

At KetoPet, our mission is to help dogs everywhere live longer, happier lives by teaching pet parents how to feed a ketogenic diet. Based on our studies, we believe that a ketogenic diet for dogs is the optimal diet for dog health and longevity. Unfortunately, each year about 6 million dogs in the US alone will be diagnosed with cancer. We’re focused on changing those statistics by changing your dog’s diet.
